summary: Use blackboard pattern for agent coordination instead of pipeline/message-passing
context: Multi-agent coding workflows lose context across fresh context windows. Need a shared coordination layer.
rationale: Blackboard pattern lets agents self-select into work based on visible shared state. Broadcasting needs rather than routing messages avoids coupling agents to each other.

alternatives.reason_rejected: Couples agents to each other, requires knowing the topology in advance
Adds external dependency, not git-trackable, not human-inspectable
